title: Store won't allow me to purchase champions with ip
body: I've been trying to unlock a new champion for the past few days, but it says "Not enough RP/IP" yet I had over a few thousand influence points. May I get an explanation or hear of some sort of fix for this soon?{{champion:78}}

replies.body:
This is an issue that popped up after last week's store outage. We're investigating into this, but for now, I'd like you to try a workaround that has resolved this for some players. If you launch into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen, you should be able to make purchases from the store using IP again.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!
Having the same issue, sitting at 6500 ip and cannot purchase any 6300 champions.Hope this is fixed soon.
